snippet: If one place is emerging as a test of Mitt Romney’s ability to capitalize on a new dynamic in the presidential race, it is Ohio, which every Republican president in the nation’s history has carried.
abstract: Mitt Romney steps up his campaign efforts in Ohio, a state every Republican president in the nation's history has carried; Ohio is among a handful of states that are at the heart of Romney's strategy for the remaining 28 days of the campaign.

byline.original: By JEFF ZELENY and JIM RUTENBERG
byline.contributor: Jeff Zeleny reported from Columbus, and Jim Rutenberg from New York.

lead_paragraph: If one place is emerging as a test of Mitt Romney’s ability to capitalize on a new dynamic in the presidential race, it is Ohio, which every Republican president in the nation’s history has carried.

headline.seo: With New Vigor, Mitt Romney Intensifies Ohio Campaign
headline.main: With New Vigor, Romney Resets Ohio Campaign
headline.print_headline: With New Vigor, Romney Resets Ohio Campaign
